sentences.sContent: Children capered around in front of the Smithsonian Institution.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们在史密森学会的门前雀跃嬉戏。

synos.tran: 跳跃，雀跃；[园艺]刺山柑花蕾；不法活动

remMethod.val: cape(披风) + r → 第一次穿披风走路的人 → 雀跃

trans.tranOther: to jump around and play in a happy excited way
a short jumping or dancing movement
